entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
